description:
You find yourself in a dimly lit room.
It looks like the drab basement of an office building.
To the north end only one of the fluorescent lights in the ceiling is on.
Below the light is a {{north}} with a red glowing sign above it that reads "EXIT".
There is an electrical panel to the left of the door. There is a box on the floor near the panel. {{up}}

exits.name: north
exits.description: a heavy door to the north

exits.name: up
exits.description: On the ceiling, one tile is pushed slightly to the side, exposing an opening into the duct work.
